movies.name: SPIDER-MAN 2
movies.description: Boasting an entertaining villain and deeper emotional focus, this is a nimble sequel that improves upon the original

movies.name: BATTLE ROYALE
movies.description: Battle Royale is a controversial and violent parable of adolescence, heightening teenage melodrama with life-or-death stakes.

movies.name: ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK
movies.description: Featuring an atmospherically grimy futuristic metropolis, Escape from New York is a strange, entertaining jumble of thrilling action and oddball weirdness.

movies.name: IRON MONKEY
movies.description: Iron Monkey may not have the poetic lyricism of Crouching Tiger, it makes up for it in fun and energy.

categories.name: Comedy
categories.desc: movies about funny stuff and lauging

movies.name: Juno
movies.description: The chemical equation of writer Diablo Cody plus director Jason Reitman explodes onscreen with this non-traditional family comedy showcasing Cody’s edgy contemporary dialogue.

movies.name: Shaun of the Dead
movies.description: This acerbic action comedy introduced a winning combo: sparring buddies Simon Pegg and Nick Frost and master of style Edgar Wright, who dreamed up the script with Pegg.

movies.name: Old School
movies.description: You’re my boy, Blue! Say what you will about the Frat Pack films that followed it, but “Old School” still gets a passing grade.

movies.name: Trainwreck
movies.description: Producer Judd Apatow steered breakout standup comic Amy Schumer to her smash big-screen debut ($141 million worldwide) by helping her to write a recognizably real woman to play — accessible, honest, emotional — within the genre confines of a mainstream romantic comedy.

movies.name: A walk to remember
movies.description: Producer Judd Apatow steered breakout standup comic Amy Schumer to her smash big-screen debut ($141 million worldwide) by helping her to write a recognizably real woman to play — accessible, honest, emotional — within the genre confines of a mainstream romantic comedy.

movies.name: About Time
movies.description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

movies.name: Jungle
movies.description: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village. The men soon realize that the jungle is a difficult place to be.

movies.name: Deadpool 2
movies.description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.
